REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0050 reute h f BC-SONO-TEK-OFFERING-CUT 03-09 0045

TEXT.TITLE: SONO-TEK OFFERING CUT TO 350,000 SHARES
TEXT.BODY: Sono-Tek Corp said it reduced to 350,000 from 400,000 the number of shares it will sell in its initial public stock offering. The price of the offering remains unchanged at five dlrs per share, it said. Reuter
